secrets.descriptions.disabled: By checking this option the secret will be disabled!
secrets.descriptions.encrypted: You can store your secrets in encrypted form for a better security
secrets.create.notice.userSecret: The secret you are creating will be ony available to you.
secrets.create.notice.workspaceSecret: The secret will be available to everyone in the workspace to use.
secrets.update.notice.userSecret: You can update the name, description and the state of the secret.
secrets.update.notice.workspaceSecret: You can update the name, description and the state of the secret.
secrets.updateValue.notice.userSecret: You can update the value and encryption.
secrets.updateValue.notice.workspaceSecr: You can update the value and encryption.
secrets.placeholders.description: Add a description for your secret.
secrets.placeholders.value: Enter the value of your secret.
